          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Vad tycker du om?</string>
            <string language="en">What do you think of?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An was denken Sie?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À quoi pensez-vous ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que você pensa?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">A che cosa pensate?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι σκέφτεστε;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿En qué usted piensa?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">En övning där man tränar på fraser som har att göra med vad man gillar och inte gillar.Modul 5 - Vem är du? - Fritid.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">An exercise where you practice the phrases that has to do with what you like and do not like. Module 5 - Who are you? - Recreation. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">intressen</string>
            <string language="sv">fritid</string>
            <string language="sv">fritidsintressen</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">interests</string>
            <string language="en">leisure</string>
            <string language="en">hobbies</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Übung, wo Sie die Phrasen üben, das miteinbezieht, 
was Sie mögen und nicht mögen. Modul 5 - Wer sind Sie? 
- Erholung. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice où vous pratiquez les expressions qui doit 
faire avec ce que vous aimez et n'aimez pas. Module 5 - 
Qui êtes-vous ? - récréation. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício onde você pratica as frases que tem que 
fazer com o que você gosta e não gosta. Módulo 5 - Quem
são você? - recreação. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione dove vi esercitate nelle frasi che 
riguardano che cosa gradite e non gradite. Modulo 5 - Chi 
sono voi? - ricreazione. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση όπου ασκείτε τις φράσεις που πρέπει να 
κάνουν με αυτό που συμπαθείτε και δεν συμπαθείτε. Ενότητα 5
- ποιοι είναι εσείς; - Αναψυχή. Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio donde usted practica las frases que tiene que
hacer con de lo que usted tiene gusto y no tiene gusto. Módulo 
5 - ¿Quiénes son usted? - reconstrucción. Safir.</string>
          </description>
